scripts.dev:test: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:call" "npm run start:lead" "npm run start:media" "npm run start:notification" "npm run start:telecaller" "npm run start:user"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm --prefix ./auth-service run start:prod" "npm --prefix ./call-service run start:prod" "npm --prefix ./lead-service run start:prod" "npm --prefix ./media-service run start:prod" "npm --prefix ./notification-service run start:prod" "npm --prefix ./Telecaller-service run start:prod" "npm --prefix ./user-service run start:prod"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm --prefix ./auth-service run build" "npm --prefix ./call-service run build" "npm --prefix ./lead-service run build" "npm --prefix ./media-service run build" "npm --prefix ./notification-service run build" "npm --prefix ./Telecaller-service run build" "npm --prefix ./user-service run build"
scripts.build-and-start: npm run build:all && npm run start:prod
